description:
ttth (talk to the hand) is an electron based desktop app for online services like WhatsApp, Threema, Telegram, Twitter, Google and several others.


* New services: gitter, wire, steam chat * Added a periodic check for network accessibility. * Added support for more themes * Added warning to url click handler regarding non-https links * Updated electron from 5.x to 7.x * More inject scripts for existing services * several other changes
